speech:
•	Rainfall: A well-distributed rainfall of between 850 and 1,200 mm is necessary during the growing season for potatoes. 
•	Altitude: Potatoes are grown between 1,500 and 2,800 meters above sea level
•	Temperature: Potatoes thrive in cool climates, and their ideal temperature range is between 15 and 20 °C. The tuberization temperature is 15°C.
•	Soil: Free draining fertile medium loams are ideal.
•	The ideal pH range for soil is 5.5 to 7.5.
